#### List contents
 
$\texttt{ls}$: list directory contents 
 
  - $\texttt{ls -l}$: list one file per line including *file or directory permission, owner and group name, file size, created/modified date and time, file/folder name*.
 
  - $\texttt{ls -a}$: list contents including hidden files


#### Permissions

$\texttt{chmod}$: change permission
